content:
# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-71

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=8.5)
Generates electricity using steam power. The boiler was refueled multiple times, most recently in Step 69. Power is currently active (Steam Engine status: WORKING in Step 71 log).
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) (Fueled with coal)
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (fluid_system=12109, starting at x=-8.5, y=-0.5)
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine (fluid_system=12111, starting at x=-3.5, y=3
